title: Scraping a website with search options
snippet: We are looking to create a database from a website that has a search engine that shows a limited amount of records (up to 100). Each record has a specific page were we would like to capture certain data. The total amount of records we are looking to capture is 28000, so around 280 searches have to be performed and then each record has to be "clicked on" to get to the specific page were the information will be captured.
